LayoutNode.Content: SQL Server - get values from X months ago according to columndata Ask Question up vote 1 down vote favorite Let's say I have the following table (data is completely fiction):
LayoutNode.SRC:
SQL Server - get values from X months ago according to columndataAsk Questionup vote1down votefavorite

Let's say I have the following table (data is completely fiction):

6 | 2017-03 | 901 | Bill | Ill | 1 7 | 2017-05 | 901 | Bill | Healthy | 1

LayoutNode.Content: For each record, I would like to see the previous status that person had X months ago since last check (column MonthsAgoSinceLastCheck ). Notice that MonthDate can skip months.
LayoutNode.SRC: For each record, I would like to see the previous status that person had X months ago since last check (column MonthsAgoSinceLastCheck). Notice that MonthDate can skip months.

LayoutNode.Content: So in this case, the result would be
LayoutNode.SRC: So in this case, the result would be

LayoutNode.Content: ID | MonthDate | PersonID | Name | Status | MonthsAgoSinceLastCheck | PreviousSatus 1 | 2017-12 | 900 | Jack | Ill | - | - 2 | 2018-01 | 900 | Jack | Ill | 1 | Ill 3 | 2018-02 | 900 | Jack | Ill | 2 | Ill 4 | 2018-03 | 900 | Jack | Healthy | 1 | Ill 5 | 2017-02 | 901 | Bill | Healthy | - | - 6 | 2017-03 | 901 | Bill | Healthy | 1 | Healthy 7 | 2017-05 | 901 | Bill | Ill | 2 | Healthy

| - 2 | 2018-01 | 900 | Jack | Ill | 1 | Ill 3 | 2018-02 | 900 | Jack | Ill | 2 | Ill 4 | 2018-03 | 900 | Jack | Healthy | 1 | Ill 5 | 2017-02 | 901 | Bill | Healthy | - | - 6 | 2017-03 | 901 | Bill | Healthy | 1 | Healthy 7 | 2017-05 | 901 | Bill | Ill | 2 | Healthy

LayoutNode.Content: Any sugestions/tips? I tried to do this with CTE's and self-joins but failed on both.
LayoutNode.SRC: Any sugestions/tips? I tried to do this with CTE's and self-joins but failed on both.

LayoutNode.Content: asked May 18 at 7:49 DenStudent 516 1 6 25
LayoutNode.SRC: asked May 18 at 7:49DenStudent5161625

LayoutNode.Content: is MonthDate is DATE column.? – Sahi May 18 at 8:42
LayoutNode.SRC: is MonthDate is DATE column.? – SahiMay 18 at 8:42

LayoutNode.Content: add a comment | 2 Answers
LayoutNode.SRC:
add a comment | 

2 Answers 2

LayoutNode.Content: active oldest votes up vote 0 down vote It's way easier to use full dates than year and months separately. The first thing you should do is generate a full date from your year + month. Then just self join with previous month, depending on the lastcheck.
LayoutNode.SRC:
active oldest votesup vote0down vote

It's way easier to use full dates than year and months separately. The first thing you should do is generate a full date from your year + month. Then just self join with previous month, depending on the last check.

LayoutNode.Content: ;WITH DataWithDates AS ( SELECT T.ID, MonthDate = CONVERT(DATE, T.MonthDate + '-01'), T.PersonID, T.Name, T.Status, T.MonthsAgoSinceLastCheck FROM YourTable AS T ) SELECT D.ID, D.MonthDate, D.PersonID, D.Name, D.Status, D.MonthsAgoSinceLastCheck, PreviousStatus = N.Status FROM DataWithDates AS D LEFT JOIN DataWithDates AS N ON D.PersonID = N.PersonID AND N.MonthDate = DATEADD(MONTH, -1 * D.MonthsAgoSinceLastCheck, D.MonthDate)
LayoutNode.SRC: ;WITH DataWithDates AS ( SELECT T.ID, MonthDate = CONVERT(DATE, T.MonthDate + '-01'), T.PersonID, T.Name, T.Status, T.MonthsAgoSinceLastCheck FROM YourTable AS T ) SELECT D.ID, D.MonthDate, D.PersonID, D.Name, D.Status, D.MonthsAgoSinceLastCheck, PreviousStatus = N.Status FROM DataWithDates AS D LEFT JOIN DataWithDates AS N ON D.PersonID = N.PersonID AND N.MonthDate = DATEADD(MONTH, -1 * D.MonthsAgoSinceLastCheck, D.MonthDate) ;WITH DataWithDates AS ( SELECT T.ID, MonthDate = CONVERT(DATE, T.MonthDate + '-01'), T.PersonID, T.Name, T.Status, D.MonthDate, D.PersonID, D.Name, D.Status, D.MonthsAgoSinceLastCheck, PreviousStatus = N.Status FROM DataWithDates AS D LEFT JOIN DataWithDates AS N ON D.PersonID = N.PersonID AND N.MonthDate = DATEADD(MONTH, -1 * D.MonthsAgoSinceLastCheck, D.MonthDate)

LayoutNode.Content: I'm assuming your MonthDate has values for all rows, otherwise the conversion will fail. I'm also assuming that your - values for MonthsAgoSinceLastCheck are actually NULL .
LayoutNode.SRC: I'm assuming your MonthDate has values for all rows, otherwise the conversion will fail. I'm also assuming that your - values for MonthsAgoSinceLastCheck are actually NULL.

LayoutNode.Content: up vote 0 down vote try this: select *,LAG(Status) OVER(Partition by Name Order by MonthDate,Id) AS PreviousSatus from tab1 order by id SQl Fiddle: http://sqlfiddle.com/#!18/04407/4
LayoutNode.SRC:
up vote0down vote

try this:

select *,LAG(Status) OVER(Partition by Name Order by MonthDate,Id) AS PreviousSatus from tab1 order by id select *,LAG(Status) OVER(Partition by Name Order by MonthDate,Id) AS PreviousSatus from tab1 order by id select *,LAG(Status) OVER(Partition by Name Order by MonthDate,Id) AS PreviousSatus from tab1 order by id SQl Fiddle:http://sqlfiddle.com/#!18/04407/4
